    • Uses of LexicalRule in eu.excitement.entailment.core.component.lexicalknowledge

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<LexicalRule<? extends I>> LexicalResource.getRules(java.lang.String leftLemma, PartOfSpeech leftPos, java.lang.String rightLemma, PartOfSpeech rightPos)
      This method returns a list of lexical rules whose left and right sides match the two given pairs of lemma and POS.
      java.util.List<LexicalRule<? extends I>> LexicalResource.getRules(java.lang.String leftLemma, PartOfSpeech leftPos, java.lang.String rightLemma, PartOfSpeech rightPos, TERuleRelation relation)
      An overloaded method for getRules.
      java.util.List<LexicalRule<? extends I>> LexicalResource.getRulesForLeft(java.lang.String lemma, PartOfSpeech pos)
      Returns a list of lexical rules whose left side (the head of the lexical relation) matches the given lemma and POS.
      java.util.List<LexicalRule<? extends I>> LexicalResource.getRulesForLeft(java.lang.String lemma, PartOfSpeech pos, TERuleRelation relation)
      an overloaded method for getRulesForLeft.
      java.util.List<LexicalRule<? extends I>> LexicalResource.getRulesForRight(java.lang.String lemma, PartOfSpeech pos)
      Returns a list of lexical rules whose right side (the target of the lexical relation) matches the given lemma and POS.
      java.util.List<LexicalRule<? extends I>> LexicalResource.getRulesForRight(java.lang.String lemma, PartOfSpeech pos, TERuleRelation relation)
      An overloaded method for getRulesForRight.
